sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT ISNULL(FriendlyDatabaseName, DatabaseName) AS DatabaseName, SchemaName, ObjectName
FROM [dbo].[vwMetadataSQLServer]
WHERE IsLatestLoad = 1
	AND (ISNULL(FriendlyDatabaseName, DatabaseName) = '@{pipeline().parameters.DatabaseName}' OR NULLIF(TRIM('@{pipeline().parameters.DatabaseName}'),'') IS NULL)
	AND (SchemaName = '@{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}' OR NULLIF(TRIM('@{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}'),'') IS NULL)
	AND (ObjectName = '@{pipeline().parameters.ObjectName}' OR NULLIF(TRIM('@{pipeline().parameters.ObjectName}'),'') IS NULL)

SELECT DISTINCT ISNULL(FriendlyDatabaseName, DatabaseName) AS DatabaseName, SchemaName, ObjectName
FROM [dbo].[vwMetadataSQLServer]
WHERE IsLatestLoad = 1
	AND (ISNULL(FriendlyDatabaseName, DatabaseName) = '@{pipeline().parameters.DatabaseName}' OR NULLIF(TRIM('@{pipeline().parameters.DatabaseName}'),'') IS NULL)
	AND (SchemaName = '@{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}' OR NULLIF(TRIM('@{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}'),'') IS NULL)
	AND (ObjectName = '@{pipeline().parameters.ObjectName}' OR NULLIF(TRIM('@{pipeline().parameters.ObjectName}'),'') IS NULL)

source.query:
WITH pdtmp AS
(
SELECT pd.PaymentID, SUM(pd.InvoiceNet) as Amount 
FROM AvidPayTransaction_trn_tPaymentDetail_snapshot pd
GROUP BY pd.PaymentID
)

SELECT
	tcbm.CustomerID,
	tBank.Name as BankAccount,
	tPayment.ONSTnumber as CheckNumber,
	tPayment.`Date` as PaymentDate,
	tpaytype.Descr as Status,
	tPayer.ClientPayerID as EntityID,
	tPayee.Name as VendorName,
	tPayee.ClientPayeeID as VendorID,
	pm.Descr as PaymentMethod,
	pd.Amount,
	tPayment.LastUpdateTime AS PaymentLastUpdateTime
FROM AvidPayTransaction_trn_tPayment_snapshot AS tPayment 
	LEFT OUTER JOIN AvidPayTransaction_trn_tPayee_snapshot AS tPayee ON tPayment.PayeeID = tPayee.PayeeID
	LEFT OUTER JOIN AvidPayTransaction_trn_tPayer_snapshot AS tPayer ON tPayer.PayerID = tPayment.PayerID
	LEFT OUTER JOIN AvidPayTransaction_pfl_tBank_snapshot AS tBank ON tPayment.BankID = tBank.BankID
	LEFT OUTER JOIN AvidPayTransaction_static_tPaymentMethod_snapshot AS pm ON tPayment.PaymentMethodID = pm.PaymentMethodID
	LEFT OUTER JOIN AvidPayTransaction_pfl_tUser_snapshot AS tUser ON tUser.UserID = tPayment.UserID
	LEFT OUTER JOIN AvidPayTransaction_pfl_tOrganization_snapshot AS org ON org.OrganizationID = tUser.OrganizationID
	LEFT OUTER JOIN AvidPayTransaction_pfl_tBuyer_snapshot AS tBuyer ON tBuyer.BuyerID = org.OrganizationID
	LEFT OUTER JOIN Ordermanagement_neo_tCustomerBuyerMapping_snapshot AS tcbm ON tcbm.BuyerID = tBuyer.AvidSuiteOrganizationID
	LEFT OUTER JOIN AvidPayTransaction_static_tPaymentType_snapshot AS tpaytype ON tpaytype.PaymentTypeID = tPayment.PaymentTypeID
	LEFT OUTER JOIN pdtmp AS pd ON pd.PaymentID = tPayment.PaymentID;
